about_the_game:
"The bullets in this world have too much momentum."
An action game where bullets keep bouncing!

All you can do is move left and right, jump, and attack (fire bullets).It is a very simple action game where you proceed while defeating enemies.
However, bullets in this game just keep bouncing.
Therefore, once you hit an enemy to kill it, you will have to keep dodging that bullet.

Considering the position and movement of the enemy, it is necessary to devise where and when to fire bullets.
As you progress through the stages, various enemies and gimmicks will appear, and wisdom and techniques will be required.

Let's control the flying bullets well and move forward while dodging.
Can you clear to the last stage?

* Since the game screen is under development, it may be different in the product version.
*This game was created using Pixel Game Maker MV.

name: 弾弾～DANDAN～

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo 2.0GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: It's simple, but it needs some ingenuity! ? An action game where bullets keep bouncing! If you attack to defeat an enemy, the bullets you fire will continue to bounce off, so you will continue to avoid your own attacks. Proceed through the stages by adjusting the timing and position of your attacks.
